column2: "No, that was amazing! Your moves have been burned into my mind. I'm jealous of what good experience you're gaining!"

"So I guess with that kind of enemy, the
best thing to do is to move in real quick,
then smack 'em down nice and hard."

"I'm gonna remember that for future use!
Thanks, friend!"

"いやほんとスゴかったなぁー！
動きがオレの目に焼き付いてるよ。
いい経験を積めてうらやましいぜ！"

"やっぱ、ああいう相手には
一気に間合いを詰めてザクッ！
っていくのが王道だよな。"

"オレも参考にさせてもらうぜ！
ありがとな！"
